author: breser
msg: On svn-auth-x509 branch, restore Subject output.
(svn_x509_parse_cert): Convert the subject data to a Distinguished Name
string and store it in the certinfo hash.
(x509_test): Remove the cert_name member, add a subject member.
(cert_tests): Remove cert_name entries and add subject entries.
(compare_results): Verify subject, replace cert_name with subject.
